title: How To Repair a Punctured Lawn Tractor Tyre | Tubeless Tire Repair

tasks.task: Fixing a punctured lawn tractor tire
subtasks: Jack up the tractor
Remove the wheel
Pump up the tire to locate the leak
Apply soapy solution to find the leak
Mark the location of the leak
Prepare the plug using the repair kit
Clean the hole with the drill tool
Insert the plug into the tire
Trim the excess plug material
Re-pump the tire to check for leaks
Apply grease to the wheel hub
Reinstall the wheel and hubcap
